comment.author: 17246015@N00
comment._content: Not the Heinrich Pursuit. "..the Pursuit was a single-bay, unequal-span biplane..."  This is clearly a monoplane.  Heinrich supposedly only designed the one plane...  any ideas?

comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/dollsanddistopia] 
The cowl and two cockpits (seen in the accompanying Bain photo below) makes this the Heinrich Model D.
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5642875387/in/photostream/]

comment.author: 35072786@N08
comment._content: TVL 1970, The Ferret and Richard Arthur Norton: Thanks for the additional information on this event and the type of aircraft. We will add some of it to the description when we update.
